title: LGBT PRIDE MONTH
body: Can we please have some new skins for pride month ? the only rainbow skins are arcade skins for now.

replies.body: pls riot just stay away from real life events.

Tumbler is where you go if you want to be prideful about something.  League, as a video game, is where you leave all that real stuff behind for a little while.  On here we're not straight or gay or any other label you can think of, we're just players.
If Riot tries to get involved with a current controversial event or movement, there will be backlash.
